fields.summary: Local Html based web view not working on sdk 8

comments.body:
The old iOS native {{UIWebView}} has been deprecated by Apple. As of Titanium 8.0.0, the {{Ti.UI.WebView}} has been re-implemented to use Apple's {{WKWebView}} which does have some breaking changes on Apple's end. For your local HTML files, you'll need to add the following {{}} tag so that it'll scale the contents like how it worked before. {code:html}

Hello World

{code}

Hello, I have tested the sample code by Joshus above of local HTML with SDK 8.0.0.GA in iOS. Works fine on my end. Please share sample code can reproduce the issue. We will test it on our end. Thanks.
